flawed_nl_solution:
The original flock gains 30-20=<<30-20=10>>10 ducks per year
So after 5 years they have gained 10*5=<<10*5=50>>50 ducks
So the original flock has 100+50=<<100+50=120>>120 ducks
So the combined flock has 120+150=<<120+150=270>>270 ducks
#### 270

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 150, not 120. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
